1: One day, mama bought different fruits.
2:
"When can we have
some fruit?" we asked.
"We will eat the fruit tonight," said mama.
3:
My brother Rahim
is greedy.
He tasted all the fruit.
He ate a lot of it.
4:
"Look at what Rahim did!" shouted my little brother.
"Rahim is naughty
and selfish," I said.
6:
We were also angry
with Rahim.
But Rahim was not
sorry.
7: "Are you going to punish Rahim?" asked little brother.
8: "Rahim, you will be sorry soon," warned mama.
10: "My tummy is so sore," whispered Rahim.
11: Mama knew this would happen. "The fruit is punishing Rahim," she thought.
12:
Later, Rahim said
sorry to us. "I will never
be so greedy again," he promised.
We believed him.
